title: Mail Order Love
description: This is an out-of-print cover for ASIN B00GZANY52 Oregon Mail Order Brides series: Book One. A sweet, clean, full length, complete mail order bride romance novel with a happy ending. Boston 1886 Having lost her entire family to illness, and desperate to escape a forced marriage to a vile man, 21 year old Ellie Bates advertises herself in the newspaper as a live-in housekeeper. Oregon 1886 Gruff, good-looking cowboy Jared Ford was ordered a mail order bride as a surprise 23rd birthday present by his mischievous granny. Except her eyes failed her and she ending up ordering Ellie, who thinks she is arriving to keep house for them. Ellie canâ€™t help falling slowly, deliciously in love with Jared. But how will she cope when Jared is pushed into an arranged marriage to a prosperous, beautiful woman? Will Jared realize his true feelings for Ellie in time?
author: Amy Blakelear
